What the hell? you think very loudly. You look at yourself without the mirror, and notice your clothes have nothing over them. You look under your shirt, and sure enough, there's your bra. You tug your pants out a bit and what do you know, there's your panties. Now how in the world did that happen? you wonder as you correct your outfit. A minute later, and you are back to looking hot and ready to mingle about the party again. With your bra on top of your shirt, and your panties on top of your pants, you look damn sexy. Checking your phone, you have a text from Claire. Odd, you don't recall giving her your number. Someone else must have. The text read "Steph, when you see this message, come find me out in the backyard. I have to finish that trick I was showing everyone earlier!
So you head out to the backyard. Feeling confident, you ask everyone on the way if they like your pretty underwear. It felt good to be so casual tonight. It's rare that you get to let loose like this. Everyone stares at you and many giggle or snicker to themselves. How nice of them! Maybe you'll get a chance to talk to some of them later. But right now Claire is priority.
You find her standing by a couple of guys you've never seen before. They all stare at you as you approach. "Hey Claire, what was that trick you wanted to finish?" you inquire as you near the group. "Oh nothing, just a little magic I learned over Winter break last year. Check it out!" Claire replied, and snapped her fingers. And just like that, you realized your underwear was on all wrong. "Whoa, Claire, that's a little risque. I didn't know it was that kind of party... I'm gonna put these back on the right way, if you don't mind me un-doing your little trick."
Claire chuckled "go right ahead, Steph"
So you set to work removing your bra and panties. You watched Claire to make sure she didn't pull any funny business as you righted your undergarments. Once finished, you checked yourself one final time, just to be sure. Panties on your head, bra back around your waist. Yep, everything's right as rain again.
You finish up the party like it never happened, and those guys Claire was talking to were pretty cool, too.
You wake up the next day...
14511.title: Your underwear

choices: Stay here and see how the rest of the night goes.
Head home and change out of this hideous costume.
14512.content:
Oh yeah! Your chicken costume, how'd you forget? Silly you. It wasn't a costume party, but you suddenly remember wanting to wear this feathery atrocity earlier when you left your place. However, you don't think it's bad at all. It's your favorite outfit, and it's soooooo comfy!
You notice a pile of clothes on the floor as you reach for the handle to leave, and think to yourself ugh, some party slut must have forgotten to get dressed after hooking up. Ew. You then leave the bathroom and are greeted by at least 70 people staring right at you. They all look like they're trying to contain their laughter. Some are doing a much better job than others. Claire shouts "Steph! What are you wearing?" You cock your head like a confused puppy "uh, I'm wearing my chicken costume... It's my favorite outfit. What, is something wrong about it? Did i forget the headpiece or something?"
And with those words, the whole party burst into laughter. You stand, blushing and confused, as everyone has a riot at your expense. Not sure what to do, you stay where you are until Claire comes up to you. She puts her arm around your shoulder and says "sorry Steph, I couldn't resist. Aaron had this thing lying around upstairs and inspiration struck." She then tapped your forehead and you realized what was going on. The hypnosis! Holy shit Claire hypnotized you! And she made you think this monstrosity was your favorite set of clothing to wear! You were so embarrassed. Humiliated even. But what could you do, standing there in a chicken costume?
It came to you though, after a little thinking. As Claire began laughing, knowing you were now remembering what she did, you realized the perfect way to get back at her. "Buck!" you shout. "Buck buckawk!"
Everyone turns their heads back to you. "buck buck buck" you shout with gusto. "Cuckaw! Cockadoodledoooooo!"
You don't even hear the party's laughter as Claire stares at you in bewilderment. You stand proudly as she begins rolling on the floor, practically dying of laughter. She laughs so hard her sides begin to hurt. But you are beaming with pride. You showed her! She'll think twice next time she tries to hypnotize you.
Now what do you do though? Should you stay at the party or go home and get some rest?
The party might stay alive for hours yet. But it's also been a long, tiring day.

info.brief_description: You let someone hypnotise you. The results are humiliating.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You are at a party when one of the guests claims that they can perform hypnosis. You are skeptical but give in to peer pressure and "volunteer" to be a test subject.

Unfortunately for you, they succeed in hypnotising you and they force you to do something totally humiliating.
